channel.title: Finally (with vocals!) - By Simon M Harris
channel.description:
So hey guys, I don’t really release very much, but wanted to share this track with you since it is 100% made with Auxy apart from addig the vocals afterwards. In this track I tried to go for a ”hit” more than I usually do, so it is very simple and straight forward.
I hope you like it!
https://youtu.be/333zrZr4wD0
https://open.spotify.com/track/65i8GtWO4lghHdJ8BATZ3k?si=kd2y4NfETPePT-mpTwuRtA

item.title: Finally (with vocals!) - By Simon M Harris
item.dc:creator: simonmharris
item.description:
Hey, thank you Sunny. Im really grateful for your comments.
And I like your advice, I think it is a good idea to spread out a little. I guess it is out of my comfort zone, but I really should. The thing is I have wanted this for so long, to be able to just right about SOMETHING, like something stupid. But, haha, I always end up writing to muddled or coming back to the topic of love again. I guess I need to work on that

As you said, those tracks you mentioned are 8 years old, but that is ok. The criticism still stands, even though I might have left that way of working a little bit.
I like(d) the effect of auto-tune in some cases, to push it to high and get a more “digital” sound as it were. But I rarely do that nowadays, or maybe when I do I hope I have mastered it better, to not push it too hard.

Yeah, almost - Swedish!

Thanks alot for listening my friend!

Read full topic
item.source: Finally (with vocals!) - By Simon M Harris
